Posts.Content: Nov 11, 2017 11:09AM lunamoon97367 wrote:  Okay so still having pain it has been 4 days out of hospital now. Still catch myself trying to do stuff. But I know not to. My question is how did you all fair taking showers? Had a bilateral double mastectomy done on Monday
